title: Just-Ask.Output
description: Profile-aware output for the Just-Ask capability, returning interpreted intent and routed results.

interpretedIntent.description: The Solicitor-General's interpretation of the caller's request.

routedTo.description: The agent or capability selected to handle the request.

result.description: The response or output from the routed agent or capability.

needsClarification.description: Indicates whether additional information is required.

clarifyingQuestions.description: Questions the Solicitor-General needs answered to proceed.
